data.name: Colossus
data.description: Colossus uses his organic steel skin to protect the X-Men and harm enemies who attack him.

starItems.name: Colossus
starItems.description: Colossus uses his organic steel skin to protect the X-Men and harm enemies who attack him.

2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to primary target

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage and apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage
Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage and apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage
Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage and apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage
If Kitty Pryde is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage for this attack and apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

If Kitty Pryde is an ally:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage for this attack.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>340%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

If Kitty Pryde is an ally:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage for this attack.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

1.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to Self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies
Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional allies

2.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to Self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> Allies. Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional allies.

3.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to Self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> Allies. Apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional allies.

4.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to Self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> Allies. Apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional allies.

5.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to Self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies. Apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional allies.
5.nextUpgrade:
Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to all allies

6.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to Self and all allies.
6.nextUpgrade:
Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color>
Apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies

7.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to Self and all allies.

Apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

1.nextUpgrade: Increase duration of positive effects on self by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>

2.description:
Increase duration of positive effects on self by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
2.nextUpgrade: Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>

3.description:
Increase duration of positive effects on self by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

4.description:
Increase duration of positive effects on self by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
4.nextUpgrade: Increase duration of positive effects on self by +<color=#86e619>3</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>

5.description:
Increase duration of positive effects on self by +<color=#86e619>3</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
5.nextUpgrade: Gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>

6.description:
Increase duration of positive effects on self by +<color=#86e619>3</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
Call a random Kitty Pryde ally to attack the primary target and that Kitty Pryde ally gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage for this attack
If Kitty Pryde is not an ally, call a random <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally to attack the primary target instead

7.description:
Prolong the duration of all positive effects on self by +<color=#86e619>3</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Prolong the duration of all positive effects on all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

Call a random Kitty Pryde ally to attack the primary target. That Kitty Pryde ally gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage for this attack.
If Kitty Pryde is not an ally, call a random <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally to attack the primary target instead.

1.description:
On Spawn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self. Then clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

When a negative effect is applied to an <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>. While <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, when attacked, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On Turn, if this character has more than <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and is below <color=#86e619>80%</color> Health, heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health, then lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

When an <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
While in <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Resistance
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health
<color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health

2.description:
On Spawn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self. Then clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

When a negative effect is applied to an <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>. While <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, when attacked, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On Turn, if this character has more than <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and is below <color=#86e619>80%</color> Health, heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health, then lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

When an <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>.

While in <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Resistance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.
2.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies
While <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, when attacked, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>75%</color> Piercing

3.description:
On Spawn:
 > If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self. Then clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

<color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.
3.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health
<color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health
Kitty Pryde allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.

On Spawn:
 > If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self. Then clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
Kitty Pryde allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.
4.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
While <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, when attacked, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing

On Spawn:
 > If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self. Then clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
